description.html:
• Secure Shape – Unique round compartments hold glasses securely for decreased breakage
  • Money-Saving
    Design – Holds 2% more glasses than competitor square racks for saving
    space, time and reducing the use of dishwashing soap and chemicals
  • Rugged
    Construction – Double-wall construction provides maximum strength and
    protection while textured, scratch-resistant finish reduces slipping and
    improves grip for years of reliable use
  • Open Profile – Unique, open design allows maximum air and water flow, ensuring superior cleaning and drying
  • Optimum Compatibility – 20-compartment rack with 1 extender is ideal for holding taller glassware up to 3.56" in diameter
